section.name: JSFUnit Demo WARs
section.p: The JSFUnit Demo shows a simple "Hello JSF" application and demonstrates testing it with JSFUnit. Because JSF is initialized in a slightly different way in different containers. We have three versions of the demo.

Download the version of the Hello JSF application for your servlet container:
hellojsf-jsfunit.war for JEE5 containers such as JBoss 4.2, JBoss 5.0, and Glassfish
hellojsf-jsfunit.war for JBoss 4.0.3, 4.0.4, and 4.0.5
hellojsf-jsfunit.war for all others such as Tomcat 5.x
